snippet: The major indexes moved higher for a second consecutive day as earnings season kicked into full swing.
abstract: Stocks rally, giving Standard & Poor's 500-stock index its best two-day advance in a month; strong earnings reports from bellwether companies raise hopes for rest of the quarterly reporting season.
lead_paragraph: The major indexes moved higher for a second consecutive day as earnings season kicked into full swing.

headline.seo: Shares Rise on Strong Corporate Earnings
headline.main: Strong Earnings Reports at Bellwether Companies Bolster Shares
headline.print_headline: Strong Earnings Reports at Bellwether Companies Bolster Shares
